entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
